brand.name: TutusPorta

newsletter.title: Stay up to date
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter for updates and accessibility tips.

hero.title: The secure gateway to
hero.subtitle: Automated scanning with 8 additional categories beyond WCAG. Get clear reports, quick fixes, and continuous monitoring.
hero.noCreditCard: No credit card required. Get 1 free scan every week.

pillars.title: Why TutusPorta?
pillars.subtitle: Built for accessibility professionals and compliance teams

deeper.title: Deeper coverage
deeper.description: Keyboard, cognitive, structure, contrast, forms, landmarks, multimedia, ARIA semantics.

actionable.title: Actionable reports
actionable.description: Clear guidance with code examples, severity ratings, and prioritized fix lists.

continuous.title: Continuous monitoring
continuous.description: Scheduled scans, automated alerts, regression tracking across deployments.

compliant.title: Enterprise-ready
compliant.description: Export branded PDF/DOCX reports, white-label dashboards, SOC 2 compliance.

benefits.title: Comprehensive accessibility testing
benefits.subtitle: Go beyond basic WCAG checks with 8 additional test categories

keyboard.title: Keyboard Navigation
keyboard.description: Full keyboard accessibility testing including focus management and tab order

cognitive.title: Cognitive Load
cognitive.description: Measure content complexity, readability, and cognitive accessibility

structure.title: Document Structure
structure.description: Semantic HTML validation and proper heading hierarchy

contrast.title: Advanced Contrast
contrast.description: WCAG AAA contrast checking with visual simulations

forms.title: Form Accessibility
forms.description: Complete form validation including labels, instructions, and error handling

landmarks.title: ARIA Landmarks
landmarks.description: Proper landmark structure for screen reader navigation

multimedia.title: Multimedia
multimedia.description: Video, audio accessibility with caption and transcript checking

aria.title: ARIA Semantics
aria.description: Advanced ARIA pattern validation and role verification

features.title: Everything you need for accessibility compliance

automation.title: Automated Testing
automation.description: Schedule regular scans and get alerts when new issues are detected

reports.title: Detailed Reports
reports.description: Export professional PDF/DOCX reports with your branding

monitoring.title: Continuous Monitoring
monitoring.description: Track changes over time and prevent accessibility regressions

team.title: Team Collaboration
team.description: Share scans, assign tasks, and track remediation progress

cta.title: Start improving accessibility today
cta.subtitle: Join teams already using TutusPorta for WCAG compliance

pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that's right for your team

q1.question: Can I change plans later?
q1.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time.

q2.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q2.answer: We accept all major credit cards and bank transfers for enterprise plans.

q3.question: Is there a free trial?
q3.answer: Yes, all paid plans include a 14-day free trial. No credit card required.

contact.subtitle: Have a question or need help? We're here for you.
